application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 11 (submission of details - a) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new doors (including garage doors) with details of mouldings in section (1:1). New doors shall be made of solid timber and hand painted; b) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new windows with details of mouldings in section (1:1). New windows shall be made of solid timber and hand painted with integral glazing bars; c) Plan (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new rooflights; d) Samples of timber for glazed links, roof slates and terracotta tiles; e) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new cornice for no. 5; f) Details including photographs/specification of photovoltaic panels, including details of colour); g) Details of replacement cornice at No 5) of planning permission PP/24/05512 (Demolition and replacement of rear extension with replacement roof terrace above. Reinstatement of rear elevation of Regency house. Removal and replacement of conservatory link structure with lightweight contemporary glazed link. Demolition and replacement of building at 5a Seymour Walk (reusing materials where possible). First floor glazed link between No.5 and replacement No.5a. Internal enhancements across all retained buildings, landscape improvements and creation of roof lights)
